name: canvas_episodes_get_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webtoon.
Tool description: This API provides the largest webcomics data in the world to create a comic site/application such as webtoons.com
API description: Get episode and photo links.
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

episodeno.description: The ID of the episode as returned from the `.../canvas/episodes/list` endpoint.

titleno.description: The ID of the title as returned from the `.../canvas/titles/list` or `.../canvas/search` endpoint.

language.description: The language code for the response. Default is 'en'. Accepted values are {'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'}.
